General.Name: Alignment Healthcare LLC
General.Description: Alignment Healthcare, Inc., a tech-enabled Medicare advantage company, operates consumer-centric health care platform. It provides customized health care in the United States to seniors and those who need it through its Medicare advantage plans. The company owns Medicare advantage plans in the states of California, North Carolina, Nevada, Arizona, Florida, and Texas. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Orange, California.
General.Address: 1100 West Town and Country Road, Orange, CA, United States, 92868
